pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Zero-OS Python Client## Install```bashpip3 install 0-core-client```## How to use```pythonfrom zeroos.core0.client import Clientcl = Client(host='<0-core-host-address>', password='<JWT>')#validate that core0 is reachableprint(cl.ping())#then u can do stuff likeprint( cl.system('ps -eF').get())print( cl.system('ip a').get())#client exposes more tools for disk, bridges, and container mgmtprint( cl.disk.list())```
